title: How to be so Productive it feels illegal (No Motivation Needed)
preview_text:
Your capacity for agency determines the outcome of your life.
That is not a motivational platitude, and understanding what actually limits it has never been more urgent.

title: How to escape your AI addiction (aka 'performative productivity')
preview_text:
AI didn't make you work less. 
It made you work much more (and you're barely more productive).
I met dozens of people this year who told me the same thing. They work past midnight. They ship more than
